title: CSV Content Analyzer
description: Upload any CSV file and get an AI-powered analysis of what the data represents, including column meanings, data types, and overall topic.

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Upload CSV and view AI-generated summary of its content

interactions: User selects CSV file → parse with Papa Parse → store parsed data → call window.geaRuntimeLLM to analyze → display summary
If AI call fails → fallback message asking user to describe the file
acceptance_criteria: Accepts any CSV format without predefined schema
Displays plain-English summary of the dataset topic
Lists each column with guessed meaning and data type
Handles empty files, headers, and missing values gracefully
Works entirely client-side with no external requests
Persists last uploaded file summary in local storage
